channel.title: Ubuntu RD Tutorial
channel.description:
Warning: This may be under the wrong section. Please move it to the proper one if so.
OT: If you have a VPS that doesn't come pre-installed with a RD, I suggest looking at this guide as it will make your VPS terminal in to a virtual desktop that you can use freely just like your computer. Make sure you follow every step. (Only for Linux-Ubuntu VPS)
http://masndol.com/vps/how-to-install-remote-desktop-on-ubuntu-virtual-private-server/
If you need help either message me or comment and I will be glad to help you out. :)
